radiographic_examinations.findings: Persistence of complete response to cancer treatment, appearance and subsequent increase of subcutaneous and fascial hypermetabolism. SUVmax on fascia was 12.3 and on subcutaneous nodules was 9.5. Diffuse tracer uptake on the synovial walls of both knees.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Increase of subcutaneous and fascial hypermetabolism.
